channel.title: Npc glitch, help please!
channel.description:
hey, on my server i have an npc glitch and i dont know how to get round it and fix it, bassicly ill tell you the glitch and would you please give me a tutorial on how to fix thanks, okey bassicly this is how to do it - 1. let a npc kill you 2. go back to the npc and it wont attack you 3. kill it and get great stuff cause u cant die :(
please help me!!!!!!!!!!
